name: md-to-slides
description: Converts markdown content into a self-contained HTML slideshow with CSS transitions. Splits slides by '---' or '##' headers.

markdown.description: Markdown content to convert to slides

example.markdown:
# Welcome

Introduction slide

---

## Main Topic

Content here
example.title: My Presentation

output.format: { html: string, slideCount: number, filePath: string }

tokenSavings: Saves 500-1200 tokens by generating complete HTML slideshow instead of describing presentation structure
